title: How to Make Chocolate Walnut Fingers

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.
steps.description: Prepare the baking trays by putting down baking paper.

steps.headline: Melt the butter or margarine in the microwave.
Add to the remaining dry ingredients.
Mix until everything is combined well.
Spread the mixture across a baking tray lined with baking paper.
Place in the oven for 1/2 hour.
Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Make chocolate icing and spread across the top of the slice. Do this while the slice is still hot.

steps.headline: Sprinkle with coconut and add some extra walnuts if wished.
Cut into slices while still warm.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF. Prepare the baking trays by putting down baking paper. Melt the butter or margarine in the microwave.  Add to the remaining dry ingredients.  Mix until everything is combined well.  Spread the mixture across a baking tray lined with baking paper.  Place in the oven for 1/2 hour.  Remove from the oven. Make chocolate icing and spread across the top of the slice. Do this while the slice is still hot. Sprinkle with coconut and add some extra walnuts if wished.  Cut into slices while still warm.  Finished.
